title.rendered: Microsoft Office 2021 Home & Business | Multilanguage |1Mac 1User Lifetime

content.rendered:
Microsoft Office Microsoft Office 2021 Home & Business Home & Business | Multilanguage |1Mac 1User Lifetime  requires MacOS Catalina or higher Version.
Microsoft Office Home & Business 2021 comes with all the classic apps you need to get your work done at home or in your small business. It includes the 2021 versions of Word, Excel, PowerPoint, OneNote, Access,  Outlook. The software can be installed on a PC.
  • This is an outright purchase of Home & Business 2021 so you don’t have to worry about renewals.
  • You will receive the classic 2019 versions of Microsoft Word, Excel, PowerPoint, OneNote, Access, and Outlook.
  • The 2021 version of Excel comes with a variety of new chart types allowing you to display your data in different ways.
  • With the 2021 version of Outlook you’ll be able to use the @ symbol to add contacts into your email or calendar item for a more streamlined experience.
  • PowerPoint includes a new Zoom option which allows you to deliver non-linear presentations, seamlessly switching between slides.

System Requirements: Intel x86 64 CPU 4 GB or more RAM MAC OS 10.15 or newer 1280 x 800 or higher display resolution monitor 6 GB of HDD with HFS Plus formatted disk. Support for browsers such as IE, Edge, Safari, Chrome, or Firefox DVD Drive Ethernet/Wi-Fi – In case if you are installing over a network drive

Its a Digital Download which means Activation Code and Download link sent to via Email Only.

Microsoft Office 2021 Home & Business For Mac only

No CD/DVD/USB has been physically shipped to you

The key is for one (1) device only.

This is a 100 % Original Microsoft Office 2021Home and Business for MAC OS 10.15 or above 

The product key will activate the  full version of Microsoft Office 2021 Home & Business 

It’s compatible with PCs running Mac 

The Microsoft Office 2021 HB  will activate the multilingual language version(32/64 bit support)

Note :- This Product is only for Mac OS not for other Apple product ( No refund will be accepted If you buyed for Other Apple Product)
